sn35.2:4.3: And what’s not-self should be truly seen with proper understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
sn35.2:4.10: And what’s not-self should be truly seen with proper understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
sn35.2:4.12: They understand: ‘… there is no return to any state of existence.’”
